Title: Relates to limiting certain state aid for universities with large endowments
Summary: Limits certain state aid for universities with large endowments except to fund tuition assistance programs.
LawCode: Add ยง358-a, Ed L; add ยง1679-d, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the public authorities law, in relation to state funding for certain higher educational institutions
